name: Bug O Bug
description:
Bug o Bug is a shoot'em up game that was made for the Sprummer Game Competition made by the user Piano. And it won the competition!

In Bug o Bug, winter has past and spring has comeback cause a continuous war to start again between two bee factions for honey. You play as a bee that is part of one of the two factions going through three levels looking for honey and killing other insects or bees from the rival bee faction. And dependent on how much honey you collect will determine the ending you get.

Anyways I hope you enjoy Bug O Bug and don't forget to review and comment! 

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

X: Shoot

Space Bar: Pause

Enter: Skip The Intro
